title: Thirteen
description: Over 166 pages, Thirteen weaves a fascinating coming of age story around the Celtic legend of the thirteen treasures of Britain. Set in the early Iron Age fort of Caer Lludd (now Hampstead Heath) it chronicles the development of Rhiannon from gauche teenager to powerful warrior princess of the Catuvellauni tribe, through the tutelage of her mother, Druid Queen Rhiannon, and the majick of the Sacred Grove.
author: Tabitha Hergest
